600000: Can be exchanged for items in the shop during events.
600002: Used when challenging certain areas during events.
600003: Used to make pulls from the prize box.
600004: Can be used in exchange for items in the shop.
600006: A letter that Serena wrote to you. It gives off the faint scent of dark chocolate.
600007: A letter that Dawn wrote to you. It gives off the faint scent of something sweet.
600010: A Poké Puff you got from Serena. It tastes like a sweet memory you'll never forget.
600011: A Poké Puff you got from Dawn. It tastes like a sweet memory you'll never forget.
600012: Proof that you investigated the droughts and heavy rains. Maybe it'll come in handy for future surveys.
600013: Used to give Giovanni & Mewtwo a special power boost.
600014: Used to unlock stories in a specific event.
600015: A huge golden sphere awarded to a Trainer who showed off their finest performance and battle skills.
600016: A huge golden sphere awarded to a Trainer who bedazzled the audience with their battles.
600017: A huge golden sphere awarded to a Trainer who demonstrated exceptional strength with their partner Pokémon.
600018: A huge golden sphere awarded to a Trainer who forged a stronger bond with their partner Pokémon.
600019: Special memorabilia from when you showed your support for Elesa.
600020: Special memorabilia from when you showed your support for Lisia.
600021: A letter that Marnie wrote to you. When you read it, you feel like you’re being cheered on.
600022: A letter that Bea wrote to you. When you read it, you’re filled with a feeling  of excitement.
600023: A fudge heart from Marnie. It tastes like a sweet memory you’ll never forget.
600024: Heart truffles you got from Bea. They taste like sweet memories you’ll never forget.
600025: Used to give Cyrus & Palkia a special power boost.
600027: One of the cells that make up Zygarde... What happens when you collect them all?
600028: A nugget of the purest gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. You can exchange it for various items.
600029: A sparkly ticket with a picture of Magikarp. You can exchange it for various items.
600030: Used to give Silver & Ho-Oh a special power boost.
600031: Used to give Zinnia & Rayquaza a special power boost.
